examples.command: $xml = 'Security,ApplicationSELECT * FROM Users WHERE Active = 1<Select Path="System">*[System[(Level=1 or Level=2) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 86400000]]]</Select></Query></QueryList>'; Get-WinEvent -FilterXml $xml
examples.description: Filtre avanc√© avec XPath/XML pour les requ√™tes complexes. examples.command: Get-WinEvent -LogName Application -FilterHashtable @{Level=2} | Group-Object ProviderName | Sort-Object Count -Descending | Select-Object Count,Name -First 10
